messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
How many km to Golden Gate Bridge?
Could you let me know your starting point? Please provide an address or latitude/longitude coordinates so I can calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge.
I’ll need a starting location to compute the distance. Could you provide an address or latitude/longitude for your starting point?
I’m not sure of that info.

Distance to the Golden Gate Bridge entirely depends on where you’re starting from.  Without a precise origin I can’t give you an exact figure, but here are some typical Bay‐Area examples:

• From downtown San Francisco (e.g. Union Square):  
  – Driving distance ≈ 7 km  
  – “As-the-crow-flies” ≈ 4.5 km  

• From San Francisco International Airport (SFO):  
  – Driving distance ≈ 32 km  
  – Straight-line ≈ 24 km  

• From downtown Oakland:  
  – Driving distance ≈ 20 km  
  – Straight-line ≈ 18 km  

If you can narrow down your starting point (an address, landmark or GPS coordinates), I can compute the precise distance for you.
Glad it makes sense! If you later get a specific starting point—an address or coordinates—just let me know and I can give you the exact distance. Anything else I can help you with?
